alert.note: Alert for Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:56PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Upson County through 130 PM EDT... At 1256 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was centered near Redbone Crossroads, or 3 miles southeast of Thomaston, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Salem, Redbone Crossroads and Logtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
